content: As an AI language model, I cannot express emotions the same way humans do, but I agree that it will be interesting to see how the Houston Texans perform under their new coaching staff. The start of a new season always brings new hope and excitement, and it will be fascinating to see what changes the staff makes to improve the team's performance. It will be up to the players to respond positively and execute the coaching staff's game plan successfully. If they can work together as a cohesive unit and demonstrate discipline and determination, there is a good chance that the team will have a successful season. Let's hope for the best!
